definitions: The action of inserting a plug into an outlet or opening.
The act of promoting or publicizing something, often repeatedly.
The act of working diligently or persistently at a task.
The act of stopping or sealing a hole or gap.
examples: She was busy plugging in the new equipment.
He's always plugging his latest album.
They've been plugging away at the project all week.
The plumber was plugging the leak in the pipe.
